# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is truly exceptional, offering unparalleled benefits and features that are sure to exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value, I'm extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at a special introductory price of $150. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to the regular market price. I'm confident that you'll find immense value in this product, enhancing your daily life or work in remarkable ways. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
